descriptionList.title: About us
contentList: We have been providing professional mastic and silicone application services to London and it’s surrounding areas.
Our vast knowledge in the industry and quality workmanship has earned us quite a reputation.
Our company provides a service that is not only functional but it’s beautifully mastered as an art.

qualifiedList.title: Structural glazing sealant
contentList: We are fully qualified for applying structural glazing sealant.

newContent.title: Abseiling:
contentList: All our rope access technicians are fully qualified, fully insured and professional in mastic instalation.
